j:translation_en.jcr:title: Acme Space confirms the discovery of life form on Mars

j:translation_en.body: The Acme Space's engineering activities cover all space and communication specialities. Acme Space committed itself to a strategy of diversification by investing in strategic businesses which bring added value to the company and which provide our clients with a more complete and solid solution. As a result, the company has expanded its activities with a high focus in Research and Development.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: ACME Space activities in Brief

j:translation_fr.body: Les projets relatifs à l'ingénérie spatiale couvrent la majeur partie des activités du groupe. Afin de poursuivre son développement durable, Acme Space s'est engagée dans une stratégie de diversification de ses activités par des investissements stratégiques dans des entreprises qui apportent une valeur ajoutée à son coeur d'activité et permettent d’adresser les besoins de ses clients avec des solution toujours plus solide et complète. En paralelle, la société  cherche à élargir on activité en réalisant des investissements majeurs en recherche et développement.

j:translation_en.text: Acme Space event are communicated in this section. Besides space missions and launch, Acme Space participates in a large number of national and international events. Objective: share all informations with scientist and passionate people of the international space community.

j:translation_fr.text: Les évènements auxquels Acme Space participe sont listés dans cette section. En parallèle des missions spatiales et autres lancements, Acme Space prend part à de nombreux événements internationaux. Objectif : partager toutes informations avec les scientifiques et personnes passionnées de la communauté spatiale internationale.

j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Acme Space announce le succès de son nouveau satellite

j:translation_en.body:
Acme Space, worldwide leading and largest space engineering group, with more than 40,000 employees around the world

Acme Space is the main player in Europe and USA, deploying its expertise across the full spectrum of building satelittes and space exploration, including property development and road construction.

Founded in 1950, ACME  bases its growth on its international successes, the personal development of its collaborator and the acquisition of companies exercising similar activities with strong recurring profits.

Acme brings together an impressive array of capabilities in building services
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Acme in Brief

j:translation_fr.body:
Acme réunit un ensemble sans équivalent de compétences dans les métiers du bâtiment et du génie civil. Acme est acteur européen majeur qui bénéficie d’une expertise solide dans les domaines de la construction civile et de la mise l’infrastructures urbaines.

Fondée en 1950, l'entreprise fonde sa croissance sur ses succès internationaux, la formation et le développement personnel de ses collaborateurs et l'acquisition d'entreprises dans les métiers qui lui sont proches.

Le groupe propose à ses clients une impressionante couverture des solutions requises pour les métiers de la construction et la mise en oeuvre d'infrastructures.
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: ACME en quelques mots...

j:translation_en.description:
Mission and objectives:
- Working with public institutions and large corporations;
- Monitoring commercial and operational with our customers local service partners;
- Helping clients in defining their service offerings to end customers and their sales approach to business;
- Promotion among local actors of the ICT sector.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Sale Engineer
j:translation_en.skills: Masters degree in Telecommunications / IT, you have a successful experience of 2 years in the sale of network services, telecommunications or computer companies and communities ideally with a manufacturer.

Mission and objectives:
- Working with public institutions and large corporations;
- Monitoring commercial and operational with our customers local service partners;
- Helping clients in defining their service offerings to end customers and their sales approach to business;
- Promotion among local actors of the ICT sector.

j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Space Engineer
j:translation_fr.skills: Masters degree in Telecommunications / IT, you have a successful experience of 2 years in the sale of network services, telecommunications or computer companies and communities ideally with a manufacturer.

j:translation_en.description:
Mission and objectives:
• Develop and manage a marketing plan for our product suite end-to-end,
• Further develop all aspects of the marketing plan, including internet, offline, research,
promotion, pricing, positioning and partner programs,
• Should be familiar with the steps necessary to develop messaging, competitive positioning,
collateral, website and events strategies,
• Develop segmented marketing messages to key industry verticals to drive customer
acquisition,
• Work with key analysts, press and industry influencers,
• Manage PR, Mar Comm and Partner marketing relations / agency relationships,
• Candidate should be willing to travel regularly and be on short/medium term assignments on
the respective continent and to some extent, intercontinental,
• Develop and publish customer case studies: Work with sales teams to implement customer
referencing process including customer interviews, approvals and publishing of case studies.
Where possible, include quantified benefits.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Space Project Communication Manager
j:translation_en.skills:
The requirements for this position include, but are not limited to the following:
• 5-7 years of Enterprise, technology marketing experience
• Proven track record of success at leading small to large size companies
• Ability to work in a start-up environment, wear many hats, and have a positive "can-do"
attitude
• Detailed knowledge of the messaging process for enterprise software including multi-level
message development, supporting scenarios, customer proof points and elevator pitches and
adapt it to the New Professional Open Source industry.
• Ability to develop a collateral hierarchy with solution overview, industry, product specific levels,
• A strong understanding of global enterprise marketing - especially marketing communications,
strategic planning, marketing execution, partnership marketing
• Proven ability to adapt Enterprise skills to the Professional Open Source offering
• Proven ability to work in a cross functional team environment
• Past experience working in the Content Management space for a software company is an
asset.

j:translation_en.cast:
Acme Space is the largest space private group, with more than 40,000 employees around the world, deploying its expertise across the full spectrum of space projects, includes space launch, commercial satellites, government satellites lines of business.

More about Acme Space
j:translation_en.jcr:title: The Sky Is Not The Limit

j:translation_fr.cast:
Avec plus de 40.000 collaborateurs, Acme Space est l'un des plus grands groupes privés du domaine spatial, mettant en oeuvre toute son expertise au service de tous types de projets spatiaux, incluant les lancements, les satellites commerciaux et gouvernementaux les plus ambitieux.

En savoir plus sur Acme Space
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Le ciel n'est pas la limite

j:translation_en.cast:
Acme Space created a huge community around its activities and is currently interacting with an impressive number of passionate people thanks to valuable content produced by Acme's engineering teams.

Go to the Community Zone
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Welcome to the Space Community

j:translation_fr.cast:
Acme Space a créé une impressionante communauté autour de ses activités et échange actuellement avec un nombre important de personnes grâce à la mise à disopsition d'un contenu de qualité publié par ses équipes d'ingénieurs.

Découvrez la zone communautaire
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Bienvenue dans la Communauté Spatiale

j:translation_en.cast:
Acme Space is the largest space private group, with more than 40,000 employees around the world, deploying its expertise across the full spectrum of space projects, includes space launch, commercial satellites, government satellites lines of business.

More about our activities
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Rock Solid Work

j:translation_fr.cast:
Avec plus de 40.000 collaborateurs, Acme Space est l'un des plus grands groupes privés du domaine spatial, mettant en oeuvre toute son expertise au service de tous types de projets spatiaux, incluant les lancements, les satellites commerciaux et gouvernementaux les plus ambitieux.

En savoir plus sur nos activités
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: La qualité est notre priorité

j:translation_en.cast:
When Acme Space's engineers are in charge of a space projects, they work to succeed because there is no other alternative. It's their DNA. Discover their results in our news section.

Read our news
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Failure Is Not An Option

j:translation_fr.cast:
Quand les ingénieurs d'Acme Space prennent en charge un projet spatial, ils ciblent le succès car il n'y a pas d'autre alternative. C'est dans leur gènes. Découvrez leurs résultats dans notre section Actualités.

Lire nos actualités
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: L'échec n'est pas une option

j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Message important concernant les droits de propriété des contenus de cette démonstration

j:translation_en.text: To build this demonstration of the Jahia xCM software we used great text and picture from wikipedia (http://www.wikipedia.org). All incredible pictures used in this demonstration are in the public domain because it was created by NASA and ESA. Hubble material is copyright-free and may be freely used as in the public domain without fee, on the condition that NASA and ESA is credited as the source of the material. The material was created for NASA by Space Telescope Science Institute and for ESA by the Hubble European Space Agency Information Centre under Contract NAS5-26555. Copyright statement at hubblesite.org or copyright statement at spacetelescope.org. YOU CANNOT USE CONTENT AND PICTURES PROVIDED WITH THIS DEMONSTRATION WITHOUT RESPECTING COPYRIGHT REQUIREMENTS OF THEIR RESPECTIVE OWNERS.

j:translation_en.jcr:title: How Acme Space discovered a new galaxy using its new satellite

j:translation_en.text:
You can discover Jahia xCM v6.6.1 using the following users (login / password):

  • root / root : global administrator of this Jahia Server (with access to the Jahia Studio for website template creation / update and full server administration interface)
  • mathias / password : the Acme Space website administrator (with access to the Acme website administration interface)
  • bill / password : the Acme Space website editor in chief with edit and contribute mode access, write and update rights on the entire website structure and access personalization, page structure and content
  • jane / password: an Acme Space contributor with access to the contribute mode for simple content contribution
  • irina / password : an Acme Space website publisher who will be in charge of content validation (1 step workflow)
  • jay / password : an authenticated visitor on the Acme Space website

You may access to user's landing page by clicking on the "Go to my Space" link located at the top of this page.

j:translation_fr.text:
Vous pouvez découvrir Jahia xCM v6.6.1 en naviguant dans ce site avec les profils suivants (login / mot de passe) :

  • root / root : le super administrateur du serveur Jahia avec accès à l'interface d'administration complète du serveur et au Jahia Studio pour la création et modification des templates utilisés sur le site
  • mathias / password : l'administrateur du site Acme Space avec accès à l'interface d'administration du site Acme Space
  • bill / password : l'éditeur en chef du site Acme Space qui peut accéder aux modes "Edition" et "Contribution", pourra créer et modifier du contenu ainsi que la structure du site, des pages sur l'ensemble du site dont il peut également personnaliser l'accès.
  • irina / password : une responsable de la validation du contenu sur le site Acme Space (workflow à 1 étape)
  • jane / password: une créatrice de contenu disposant d'un accès au mode "Contribution", interface simplifiée de création de contenu.
  • jay / password : un visiteur identifié

Vous pouvez également accéder a la page d'accueil de chaque utilisateur en cliquant sur le lien "Aller à Mon Espace" situé en haut de la page.

GRANT_u_bill.j:roles: contributor editor editor-in-chief privileged translator-en translator-fr
